attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The PM needs to acknowledge the immense benefits and improvements to our standards of living the private car has given us all. Please will he recognise the vast sums of revenue raised from motorists every year in the motoring taxes they pay.He should pay  more attention to the interests of  motorists who are in a majority rather than the minority environmental pressure groups He should abandon plans to increase taxation of motorists by any road pricing schemes and reduce fuel taxation to a more sensible level.Public transport should be self financing and not subsidised 
THE GOVERNMENT SHOULD GIVE MOTORISTS A FAIRER DEAL AND NOT TAX THEM OFF THE ROADS

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
